statements: SELECT * FROM water_conservation_regulations
SELECT regulation_name, enforcement_agency FROM water_conservation_regulations
SELECT regulation_description AS description, compliance_requirements AS requirements FROM water_conservation_regulations
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3
SELECT regulation_name, enforcement_agency FROM water_conservation_regulations WHERE compliance_requirements = 'mandatory'
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, enforcement_agency FROM water_conservation_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency FROM water_conservation_regulations WHERE compliance_requirements LIKE '%water%';
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_regulations ORDER BY enforcement_agency DESC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_description FROM water_conservation_regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%regulation%';
SELECT * FROM WaterRegulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_deadline FROM WaterRegulations;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRecords;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_deadline FROM WaterRegulations WHERE compliance_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status, last_checked FROM ComplianceRecords ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_deadline FROM WaterRegulations WHERE compliance_deadline > '2022-06-30';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM WaterRegulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_compliance_records FROM ComplianceRecords;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_deadline FROM WaterRegulations WHERE compliance_deadline < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY compliance_deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, location, contact_email FROM companies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_email FROM companies WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations
SELECT * FROM companies
SELECT violation_description, violation_date, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE penalty_amount > 1000
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM companies ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE deadline <= NOW()
SELECT * FROM water_regulations;
SELECT business_name, location FROM businesses WHERE industry_type = 'Technology';
SELECT inspection_date, compliance_status FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fine_amount FROM penalties;
SELECT regulation_name, region, enforcement_agency FROM water_regulations WHERE compliance_deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM water_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, region FROM water_regulations WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT business_name, industry_type FROM businesses WHERE industry_type = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT business_name, fine_amount FROM businesses b JOIN penalties p ON b.id = p.inspection_id WHERE p.payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, primary_agency FROM regulations;
SELECT company_name, location FROM companies;
SELECT description, regulation_name FROM regulations;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector, company_id FROM inspections;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, primary_agency FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;

SELECT c.company_name, cr.requirement_name, cr.description FROM companies c JOIN company_compliance cc ON c.id = cc.company_id JOIN compliance_requirements cr ON cc.requirement_id = cr.id WHERE c.location = 'New York';
SELECT company_name, COUNT(requirement_id) AS total_requirements FROM companies c JOIN company_compliance cc ON c.id = cc.company_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_requirements DESC;

SELECT i.inspection_date, c.company_name, i.inspector FROM inspections i JOIN companies c ON i.company_id = c.id WHERE i.inspector LIKE '%Smith%' AND i.inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
